name: @zthun/roadblock.api
description: This is the roadblock api used to get cookie tokens for the user on the given domain.
author: Anthony Bonta

scripts.docker:publish: docker push zthun/roadblock.api && docker push zthun/roadblock.api:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:build: npm pack && docker build . -t zthun/roadblock.api:latest -t zthun/roadblock.api:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
